title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 571.2 - Determination of the existence of a wetland
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 571.2 - Determination of the existence of a wetland

State Regulations

The agency will, upon request of any person having a legal
interest in property and contemplating a land use or development or subdivision
within the boundaries of wetlands thereon, determine whether wetlands are
present, and the exact location of wetland boundaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
571.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
